events.name: Annual City Marathon
events.description: Join thousands of runners for the 10th annual City Marathon. All skill levels are welcome. Routes for 5k, 10k, and full marathon.

events.name: Sunrise Yoga Session
events.description: A peaceful and rejuvenating beginner-friendly yoga session as the sun rises. Please bring your own mat.

events.name: CrossFit Open House
events.description: Curious about CrossFit? Come to our Open House! Free trial workouts, meet the coaches, and special membership discounts.

events.name: Advanced Weightlifting Training
events.description: An invite-only training seminar for advanced lifters. Focus on Olympic lifts, form correction, and personal record attempts.

events.name: Spinning for Charity
events.description: A high-energy, 2-hour spinning competition to raise money for the local children's hospital. All proceeds will be donated.

events.name: Meditation and Mindfulness Workshop
events.description: Learn techniques to reduce stress and increase focus in this 90-minute beginner-friendly workshop.

events.name: Community Fitness Day
events.description: A free day of fitness for the whole family! Group classes, healthy food trucks, and games for kids.

events.name: Regional Powerlifting Meet
events.description: Official competition for squat, bench, and deadlift. Come support the strongest athletes in the region.

events.name: Zumba Party!
events.description: Dance your way to fitness in this high-energy, 90-minute Zumba party. Open to all members and non-members!

events.name: Partner Acro-Yoga Basics
events.description: Bring a friend or find a partner here. Learn the fundamentals of acro-yoga in a safe and supportive environment.

blogs.title: Mobility vs. Flexibility: What's the Difference?
blogs.body: Curabitur non nulla sit amet nisl tempus convallis quis ac lectus. Many people use these terms interchangeably, but they are not the same. Flexibility is the ability of a muscle to stretch, while mobility is the ability of a joint to move through its full range of motion.
